claim: John Connally was a politician.
LM: As a Democrat he served as Secretary of the Navy under President John F. Kennedy , as the 39th Governor of Texas , and as Secretary of the Treasury under President Richard Nixon .

claim: Guam was ceded under the terms of an accord.
LM: Under the Treaty of Paris , Spain ceded Guam to the United States on December 10 , 1898 .

claim: Essos is a fictional continent where the book A song of Ice and Fire takes place.
LM: A Song of Ice and Fire takes place on the fictional continents Westeros and Essos .

claim: The score for Call of Duty was composed by Michael Giacchino.
LM: He composed the scores to the television series Lost , Alias and Fringe , the video ' game series Medal of Honor and Call of Duty and many films such as The Incredibles , Ratatouille , Up , Mission : Impossible - Ghost Protocol , Dawn of the Planet of the Apes , Jurassic World , Inside Out , Star Trek Beyond , Doctor Strange , Rogue One and Spider-Man : Homecoming .

claim: Marc Maron has a television show.
LM: From 2013 to 2016 , he starred in his own IFC television comedy series , Maron , for which he also served as executive producer and occasional writer .

claim: New Horizons had scientific capabilities.
LM: The Jupiter flyby provided a gravity assist that increased New Horizons speed ; the flyby also enabled a general test of New Horizons scientific capabilities , returning data about the planet 's atmosphere , moons , and magnetosphere .

claim: Jupiter had scientific capabilities.
LM: The Jupiter flyby provided a gravity assist that increased New Horizons speed ; the flyby also enabled a general test of New Horizons scientific capabilities , returning data about the planet 's atmosphere , moons , and magnetosphere .

claim: Treasure is a single by Bruno Mars.
LM: " Treasure " is a song recorded by Bruno Mars for his second studio album , titled Unorthodox Jukebox ( 2012 ) . The song is the album 's fourth track and was selected as its third single by Atlantic Records .

claim: Deadpool stars Ryan Reynolds as Wade Wilson, AKA Deadpool.
LM: Deadpool is a 2016 American superhero film directed by Tim Miller and written by Rhett Reese and Paul Wernick , based on the Marvel Comics character of the same name . Deadpool , whose real name is Wade Wilson , is a disfigured and mentally unstable mercenary with the superhuman ability of an accelerated healing factor and physical prowess . Reynolds himself would eventually portray the character in the 2009 film X-Men Origins : Wolverine and reprised the role in the 2016 film Deadpool .

claim: Brian Eno attended an institution in the 1960s.
LM: Born in Suffolk , Eno studied painting and experimental music at art school in the late 1960s before joining glam rock group Roxy Music as synthesizer player in 1971 .

claim: Brian Eno attended an institution in Suffolk.
LM: Born in Suffolk , Eno studied painting and experimental music at art school in the late 1960s before joining glam rock group Roxy Music as synthesizer player in 1971 .

claim: George H. W. Bush has been active in a humanitarian activity.
LM: His presidential library was dedicated in 1997 , and he has been active - often alongside Bill Clinton - in various humanitarian activities .

claim: Bob Marley was not a vocalist.
LM: Robert Nesta Marley , OM ( 6 February 1945 - 11 May 1981 ) was a Jamaican singer-songwriter , musician and guitarist who achieved international fame and acclaim , blending mostly reggae , ska and rocksteady in his compositions .

claim: Android has not been the target of patent and copyright litigation.
LM: The success of Android has made it a target for patent and copyright litigation as part of the so-called " smartphone wars " between technology companies .

claim: Singapore has a high level of press freedom.
LM: The dominance of the PAP , coupled with a low level of press freedom and restrictions on civil liberties and political rights , has led to Singapore being classified by some as a semi-authoritarian regime .

claim: Antarctica is a country.
LM: Antarctica is a de facto condominium , governed by parties to the Antarctic Treaty System that have consulting status . In international law , a condominium ( plural either condominia , as in Latin , or condominiums ) is a political territory ( state or border area ) in or over which multiple sovereign powers formally agree to share equal dominium ( in the sense of sovereignty ) and exercise their rights jointly , without dividing it into ` national ' zones .

claim: Slovakia is a country.

claim: OK Computer was recorded by Bob Dylan and released by Columbia Records.
LM: OK Computer is the third studio album by English alternative rock band Radiohead , released in 1997 on EMI subsidiaries Parlophone and Capitol Records .
